dict.acceptation: 混合，混杂；混杂的事物[人群]；混合（状态）；

sent.orig: Coat the chicken with flour mixture, then dip in egg mixture and coat with cashew mixture.
sent.trans: 裹上面粉，再沾上一层蛋液，最后裹上腰果面包屑。

sent.orig: Finished mixture of quality control and storage of transport by conventional mixture to carry out.
sent.trans: 成品混合料的质量控制和储存运输按常规的混合料进行。

sent.orig: The expressions of separative power of both binary mixture and multicomponent mixture are presented.
sent.trans: 介绍了二元和多组分同位素混合物的分离功率表达式，以此衡量分离装置分离性能好坏。

sent.orig: In mixture problems,additional mixture constraints often are imposed.
sent.trans: 在混料问题中，经常出现附加的混料约束。

sent.orig: Pour the rice flour mixture into the turnips and cook until the mixture thickens.
sent.trans: 把米浆倒入萝卜中，拌炒至粘稠。
